content: I will attend the Vision And Learning SEminar(VALSE2025) in Zhuhai, China, as a speaker of poster on June 7th.
One paper has been accepted by EAAI
Navibridger has been accepted by CVPR2025
Navidiffusor has been accepted by ICRA2025
I started my Ph.D. student journey at SYSU
I attended the ICASSP2024 in Seoul, Korea, as a speaker of poster on April 18th.
One paper has been accepted by ICASSP2024
Adaptive Patchwork has been accepted by IEEE RA-L
